title: Feta & semi-dried tomato omelette
directions:
Heat the oil in a small frying pan, add
the eggs and cook, swirling the eggs
with a fork as they set. When the eggs
are still slightly runny in the middle,
scatter over the tomatoes and feta,
then fold the omelette in half. Cook for
1 min more before sliding onto a plate.
Serve alongside a mixed leaf salad.
